name: RE: TC GCC+ Migration
content:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.




Hi Govind,

 

Please refer Supported Connectors - Tableau (menlosecurity.com)
[https://safe.menlosecurity.com/https:/help.tableau.com/current/pro/desktop/en-us/exampleconnections_overview.htm]
for TC Vista connectivity migration.

 

Thanks & regards
Sangeetha

 

From: Govindarajan Ponnusamy <Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>

To: Sonia EDWARD AROKIARAJ (SINGSTAT) <Sonia_EDWARD_AROKIARAJ@singstat.gov.sg>

RAMACHANDRAN (SINGSTAT) <Sangeetha_RAMACHANDRAN@singstat.gov.sg>
Subject: RE: TC GCC+ Migration

 

Hi Sonia

 

Attaching the updated architecture for your reference.

 

To provide an update regarding the utilization of endpoints in the management
tier, the aim is to effectively oversee and monitor the subsequent endpoints.

 

 1. Intranet compartment
 2. Internet compartment

 

Cheers!

Govind

highlighted information). Few details can be update after the deployment. Please
review and provide your feedback. We are still working the DB details sheet.
Will keep you posted on further updates.

   PROD) - Completed
 * DOS_GCC+_MSSQL-RDS_Configuration_workbook_v1.1 (attached in this email) – In
   progress
 * Updated architecture - Completed
 * Updated BOM - Completed

 

 

Thanks & Regards,

Narayanan G

 

From: Sonia EDWARD AROKIARAJ (SINGSTAT) <Sonia_EDWARD_AROKIARAJ@singstat.gov.sg>
Sent: Monday, 14 August 2023 10:43 AM
To: Ganesan Narayanan <Narayanan.GANESAN@totalebizsolutions.com>; Govindarajan
Ponnusamy <Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>; Karthickrajan Ramadass
<Karthickrajan.R@totalebizsolutions.com>
Cc: Gregory SEOW (SINGSTAT) <Gregory_SEOW@singstat.gov.sg>; Yan Hao TIONG
(SINGSTAT) <TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Sangeetha RAMACHANDRAN (SINGSTAT)
<Sangeetha_RAMACHANDRAN@singstat.gov.sg>; Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT)
<Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>; Benedict NG (SINGSTAT)
<Benedict_NG@singstat.gov.sg>; Kannan Alagu <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>;
Kannan ALAGU from.TeBS (SINGSTAT) <Kannan_ALAGU_from.TeBS@singstat.gov.sg>;
Abdul Azim Bin Abdul Aziz <Azim.AZIZ@totalebizsolutions.com>; Chin Peng Phay
Benjamin <Benjamin.C@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC GCC+ Migration

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.

 

Hi Govind/Narayanan/Karthick,

 

Please find the below action items received from Day 1 Infra after our
discussion with them last Friday. Please help to work on below items and share
by tomorrow ,feel free to reach out to me if any clarifications are needed.

 

 * DOS_GCC Plus_Configuration_workbook_v1.8 - 2 separate workbooks ( UAT and
   PROD)
 * DOS_GCC+_MSSQL-RDS_Configuration_workbook_v1.1 (attached in this email)
 * Updated architecture
 * Updated BOM
 * SA-Cloud-System-Checklist-V4.0 (to be updated based on latest architecture)

 

No

Item

Action Needed

By Whom

By When

1

 

[Inventory List]

 

Discussed on the inventory list

 1. DOS Apps Team shared the inventory app list which consists of 38 objects:

a.      6 x LB

b.      32 x EC2 instances

 

 2. DOS Apps Team to share the updated BOM with NCS D1 Cloud Team.

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

2

[OS/Middleware Compatibility]

 

Discussed on the current OS/Middleware version and supported OS/Middleware
version

 

1.      [Info] DOS Apps Team confirmed that the application able to support the
following:

 * Windows 2022
 * SQL 2022

 

2.      [Info] DOS Apps Team confirm that the following OS/Middleware are not in
use:

 * Oracle DB
 * Oracle Weblogic
 * Solaris

 

-

-

3

[Configuration Workbook – Subnet]

 

Discussed on the Subnet requirement.

 1. [Info] NCS Apps Team shared that the:

 * App & DB should be hosted in PLZ section if it contains confidential data.
 * IT Tier to move to App Tier

 

 2. DOS Apps Team to update the subnet accordingly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

DOS Apps Team

 

 

 

 

 

16 Aug

4

[Configuration Workbook – NACL Rules]

 

Discussed on the NACL requirements.

 

 1. DOS Apps Team to update the egress high ports for the destination.

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

5

[Configuration Workbook – Internet WAF]

 

Discussed on the Internet WAF requirements.

 

 1. DOS Apps Team to update the WAF and provide the custom rules.

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

6

[Configuration Workbook]

 

Discussed on the no. of configuration workbooks to be submitted.

 

 1. DOS Apps Team to provide 2 separate workbooks:

a.      UAT

b.      PROD

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

7

[Configuration Workbook – CloudWatch]

 

Discussed on the CloudWatch requirements.

 

 1. DOS Apps Team to furnish the server name and path to the logs.

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

8

[Configuration Workbook – Whitelisted Apps]

 

Discussed on the Whitelisted Apps requirements.

 

 1. DOS Apps Team to pen down the 3rd party tools to be used.

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

9

[GPC Common Services]

 

Discussed on the GPC Common Services used by the application

 1. DOS Apps Team shared that the current services in used are:

 * SFTP
 * SMTP (AMR)

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

10

[Application Architecture]

 

Discussed on the overall application architecture flow

 1. DOS Apps Team to update the diagram based on the discussion with NCS D1
    Cloud Team.

 

 

DOS Apps Team

16 Aug

 

Thanks & regards

Sonia
